amendment.description: Amendment provides for grants to be made available through the Bureau of Justice Assistance to law enforcement agencies to combat sexual abuse of children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to provide for grants to combat sexual abuse of children. Such grants shall be made by the Bureau of Justice Assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Conyers.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
